workExperience.desc: Developed a dynamic conference schedule built with react embedded in a Framer project. Challenges of this project include not using any imports, generating CSV files, and using Google Sheets as a database.
Developing Web3 DeFi applications using React, Next.js and Tailwind. Responsibilities include UI/UX, Design, Branding, and Engineering

f2pool and stakefish are leading service providers for blockchain infrastructure security. Their focus on decentralization and security is well regarded in the open source blockchain development community. The marketing team promotes and raises awareness to innovative cutting edge projects in the world of crypto.
Designed and managed a library of WordPress commercial websites.
